adviseScripts.text: I need more weapons.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Do you know any place that's worth spending my money on?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: What do you need them for, exactly?
Dark Net?
Did nobody ever tell you that curiosity killed the cat?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Save yourself a world of trouble and stop asking.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Huh. Never expected you to recommend that place.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Even the most righteous hero will betray the law,
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: when it comes to weapon quality.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: I share a serious conversation with Crow.
Do you see the bomb attached to my neck?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Do you have the authority to get it taken off?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: I will make the request to Syuen.
Tsk. I knew you would react like that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: What?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Ha. Ha.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Your joke was so funny I almost forgot to laugh.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: I get to understand Crow a little better.
Viper is up to something.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: I just can't figure out what it is.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: I'll try to snoop around.
Do you have any guesses?
No. Just leave her be.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: It might be a lot more fun this way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: No good leads yet.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Either she's starting a riot, or about to jump into one.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Heck. Maybe it's both.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: I get to understand Crow's interpersonal relationships.
Jackal seems even more stupid these days.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Any good tips for training a dog?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Jackal is not a dog.
I will ask a Nikke who owns a dog.
What is that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Jackal is a dog.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Once you get bitten, you'll know.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Hey, that'd be a great help.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Since the wealthy old people of the Royal Road are the only ones allowed to keep dogs,
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: I have no idea who else to ask.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: I have a friendly conversation with Crow.
What's the difference between humans and Nikkes?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Just the mechanical aspects of the body.
The possibility of duplication.
Huh. I see...
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Nikkes' bodies are mostly mechanical, after all.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Huh. I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: You can always just make more Nikkes.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: That makes it hard to think of them as human, right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Interesting. Is that what most people think?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: I share a deep conversation with Crow.
{AccountData.NickName}, let me ask you one thing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Say you have a bottle filled with disgusting little maggots.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Would you use wash and reuse that bottle?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Or would you just burn it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: I would wash it and reuse it.
I would burn it.
... Hey, Pal?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: You really don't know when to give up.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: That's why I always want to test your limits...
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: It's no different in the Ark.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Burning something is faster than cleaning.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: I share a deep conversation with Crow.
Hey, {AccountData.NickName}.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: You ever been to the Outer Rim?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Yes.
No.
Oh. Really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: It's a nasty place.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: It's also what the real Ark looks like, without any modification.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: That's why I like it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: ... Hey, Pal?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: You really know nothing about the Ark.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: I share a deep conversation with Crow.
Yesterday, a Nikke said I was a psychopath.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: She said I was promoting rebellion.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: What do you think?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: I think she's right.
No, of course not.
Hm. It's refreshing to hear someone to just say what they think.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Yeah, right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: I'm not a psychopath. I'm probably more of a sociopath.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: I get to understand Crow a little better.
I want to go to Royal Road...
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: But, it's hard for outlaws like me to set foot there.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Any ideas?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: I'll take you there.
Why do you want to go there?
I was hoping you'd say that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Then two of us will create very exciting news on the Tetra Net.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Can't a girl just try to relax every once in a while?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Blowing up the same numbskulls every day gets pretty boring, you know.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: I share a serious conversation with Crow.
You know, it might be hard to believe, but actually I love idealists like you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Can you guess why?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Because you enjoy breaking their ideals.
Because, deep down, you're an idealist, too.
Ha! You must be a mind reader.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: There is nothing more beautiful than a pompous idealist's frustration.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Fireworks are most beautiful when they explode. It's kind of like that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Why would you say something like that about me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Don't project your childish wishes on me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: I never think so because I'm a sociopath. I just pretend to be the same kind when they benefit me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: I get to understand Crow a little better.
If you've been waiting on a message from someone for a long time,
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: how do you keep yourself from getting too anxious?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Concentrate on something else.
Tell them to hurry it up.
... Hmm.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: It's a good suggestion, but not for me. I like things done in a hurry.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Yeah, maybe I should give them a call.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Crow picked up the cellphone.
...Hey, Viper. I told you to detonate it ages ago, how come you're still setting up?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: I got to understand Crow a little better.
Since you're a Commander, you probably run into all sorts of different Nikkes.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Is there anyone you could never be close to?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Well... you, for one.
Such a thing would never happen.
... I'm sorry to hear that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: But, as the saying goes, opposites attract.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: I'm sure you'll warm up to me in time.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: You may be right.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Where there's a will, there's a way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: If it's a Nikke we're talking about, then you could, say... input a code into her brain.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: I got to understand Crow a little better.
I don't like the way the riff-raff have been acting lately.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: How can I set them straight?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Just trust them and give them time.
Tell them specifically what they're doing wrong.
I'm not sure about that. They've let me down too many times at this point.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: If those morons had their heads on straight,
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: then the Ark and the Outer Rim would be equal in terms of policing by now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: In theory, that's what should be done.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: But I'm not so confident I'll be able to resist the urge to murder them in the process.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Should I get Viper to do it for me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: I speak with Crow about educating subordinates.
What do you think of Syuen and Missilis?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: She's a boon to mankind.
A fairly standard opinion...
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Well, I don't see any reason why someone of your stature would think otherwise.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: I can tell by your face there's a lot remaining unsaid here.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: After all, you and Syuen are always at each other's throats.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: It's nice to know we have a mutual enemy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Crow and I discuss our feelings about The Big Three.
Someone told me today that
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: I'm technically the leader of Heavenly Ascension.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: I'm sure you're not.
Is that not correct?
Are you stupid?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: What are you talking about? Heavenly Ascension has its own separate leader.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: She is a bit dense, so I have to interject sometimes...
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Now that I think about it... I suppose it's pretty much the same thing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Crow about her relationship with Heavenly Ascension.
Hey {AccountData.NickName}, what do you admire most in a person?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Firm beliefs.
Know-how.
Oh yes, very true indeed.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Let me tell you, the sense of pleasure when you break down
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: someone with firmly held beliefs... nothing compares.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: You don't say...
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Very well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: I hope you get along with whomever you're referring to.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: I got to understand Crow a little better.
Outer Rim is a place filled with outlaws and undesirables.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: If you had the power to break down the partition
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: that separated the Outer Rim and the Ark,
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: would you do it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Yes.
No.
An admirable answer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: You'd stubbornly insist on adhering to your beliefs
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: even if it meant the deaths of innocent civilians. Wonderful.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: What a boring answer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Since when were you such a realist?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Crow and I have a lively discussion about politics.
I wanted to give Jackal a gift.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Any recommendations?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: A cute hair scrunchie.
A dog toy.
You know she doesn't wear that sort of thing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Now, do you intend on actually giving me a proper recommendation?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: What a unique idea!
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: A few traitors would make for wonderful playthings.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Crow and I talk about the art of giving gifts to colleagues.
Reclaiming the surface, reclaiming the surface...
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: It's always bandied about like it's a given, but is it actually possible?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: As long as you don't give up, there is always hope.
I doubt it will happen in my lifetime.
... That's true.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Then again, those fools who go bankrupt playing the lottery have the same mindset.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: But the fact that you still fight
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: must mean you're willing to make personal sacrifices for a future generation you'll never know.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: I can't say I understand it, but it is very intriguing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: I converse with Crow about the feasibility of reclaiming the surface.
Have you ever wanted something so badly, that you were willing to die for it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: No, never.
Yes, the safety of the people.
... How disappointing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: I thought for sure you would come up with something.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Interesting...
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: I wish for destruction.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: That way, you and I can wreak havoc together.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crow

adviseScripts.text: Crow and I have an in-depth conversation.
